text:
Two persons were injured on Thursday when a can bomb exploded in a market in Guptipara under Balagarh police station of Hooghly district, the police said.

The blast took place when an employee of a hardware shop moved an old can he found in front of the shop.

The employee, Tapas Rajbangshi, who had come to open the shop, and another person, Nitai Das, were injured in the explosion. They were admitted to Balagarh primary health centre. — PTI
title: Blasts injures two in Hooghly
